title: Blockchain And Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: In a troubling and unpredictable year, blockchain and cannabis have been some of the best investments and two industries most primed for growth. Chris Naprawa, Director and Chairman of the Board at Khiron and President at TAAL Distributed Information Technologies, shares his insights on both paradigm-shifting industries. Why BSV is the protocol of the future, and why TAAL is in position to capitalize on that. Importance of data. Solving for the consumer and regulatory compliance. Future of cannabis in South America, Brazil set to be biggest medical market, Colombia demographics an advantage and accessing capital at a cost you can live with. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
